titles.title: White Sands National Park Establishment Act
A bill to establish the White Sands National Park in the State of New Mexico as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
White Sands National Park Establishment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
White Sands National Park Establishment Act
This bill establishes the White Sands National Park in New Mexico as a unit of the National Park System to protect, preserve, and restore the park's resources and recreational values and to enhance visitor experiences.
